PackageOracle.name: DA_VIDEO_PROGRAM_SEGMENT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_VIDEO_PROGRAM_SEGMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.24.735631000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,video_program_segment_id IN VARCHAR2
,video_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,segment_sequence_num IN VARCHAR2
,segment_begin_sec_in_prog_num IN VARCHAR2
,segment_end_sec_in_prog_num IN VARCHAR2
,allow_targeting_dur_sgmt_ind IN VARCHAR2
,segment_content_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,segment_duration_num IN VARCHAR2
,segment_desc IN VARCHAR2
,asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,video_program_segment_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_video_program_segment;

body.name: DA_VIDEO_PROGRAM_SEGMENT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_VIDEO_PROGRAM_SEGMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.24.745806000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,video_program_segment_id IN VARCHAR2
,video_program_id IN VARCHAR2
,segment_sequence_num IN VARCHAR2
,segment_begin_sec_in_prog_num IN VARCHAR2
,segment_end_sec_in_prog_num IN VARCHAR2
,allow_targeting_dur_sgmt_ind IN VARCHAR2
,segment_content_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,segment_duration_num IN VARCHAR2
,segment_desc IN VARCHAR2
,asset_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_video_program_segment.add, parms=' || video_program_segment_id || '|' || video_program_id || '|' || segment_sequence_num || '|' || segment_begin_sec_in_prog_num || '|' || segment_end_sec_in_prog_num || '|' || allow_targeting_dur_sgmt_ind || '|' || segment_content_type_cd || '|' || segment_duration_num || '|' || segment_desc || '|' || asset_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_video_program_segment a
(
a.video_program_segment_id
,a.video_program_id
,a.segment_sequence_num
,a.segment_begin_sec_in_prog_num
,a.segment_end_sec_in_prog_num
,a.allow_targeting_dur_sgmt_ind
,a.segment_content_type_cd
,a.segment_duration_num
,a.segment_desc
,a.asset_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.video_program_segment_id
,add.video_program_id
,add.segment_sequence_num
,add.segment_begin_sec_in_prog_num
,add.segment_end_sec_in_prog_num
,add.allow_targeting_dur_sgmt_ind
,add.segment_content_type_cd
,add.segment_duration_num
,add.segment_desc
,add.asset_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_video_program_segment.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,video_program_segment_id IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_video_program_segment.del, parms=' || video_program_segment_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_video_program_segment a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.video_program_segment_id = del.video_program_segment_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_video_program_segment.del');

END del;

END da_video_program_segment;
